name: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
desc: Options to specify how data on the pasteboard should be interpreted to initialize pasteboard data.

items.name: static var asData: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: An option to read data from the pasteboard as-is and return it as a data object.

items.name: static var asString: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: An option to read data from the pasteboard and convert it to a string object.

items.name: static var asPropertyList: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: An option to read data from the pasteboard and un-serialize it as a property list.

items.name: static var asKeyedArchive: NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: An option to read data from the pasteboard and use it to initialize the object.
